description: The outcome of two separate high-profile neighbour disputes - in Bukit Panjang and Punggol - shows that issues are resolved only when either party leaves. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: 'Neighbours from hell' move out, ending years of dispute
title_page: 'Neighbours from hell' move out, ending years of dispute | The Straits Times
maintext:
A couple from Bukit Panjang who were temporarily barred from their home by the court for disturbing their neighbour have sold their flat.
Meanwhile, a housewife in Punggol, whose alleged harassment forced six households out last year, has also found a buyer for her home and moved out about two weeks ago.
